page.title: 14Wavin Building Products 1.
page.content: { Wavin Plastics}built a new factory in Chippenham which was opened in 1983 by Princess Anne. Children from local primary schools were to the opening of what is a very modern business. In the factory they employ about two hundred people making and selling plastic pipes and fittings for the building industry. These include rainwater gutters, water pipes and plumbing fittings. The machines in the factory never stop working, so there are people working there twenty four hours a day seven days a week. This means that a lot of those who work at Wavin have to work on shifts.
